=API for trace=
Usage: 
{{{
(ns <your-namespace>
  (:use clojure.contrib.trace))
}}}


==Public Variables and Functions==
Shortcuts:
[#*trace-depth* *trace-depth*] [#(_deftrace_name_&_definition) deftrace] [#(_trace_value) trace] [#(_trace-fn-call_name_f_args) trace-fn-call] [#(_trace-indent_) trace-indent] [#(_tracer_name_value) tracer] 

----
===_`*`trace-depth`*`_===
<pre> Current stack depth of traced function calls.</pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/trace.clj#36 Source] [http://www.google.com/codesearch?hl=en&lr=&q=[^-*a-zA-Z]*trace-depth*([^-*a-zA-Z]|%24)+package%3Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fclojure-contrib\.googlecode\.com&sbtn=Search Search for references in contrib]----
===(_deftrace_ name & definition)===
====Macro====
<pre> Use in place of defn; traces each call/return of this fn, including
arguments.  Nested calls to deftrace'd functions will print a
tree-like structure.</pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/trace.clj#71 Source] [http://www.google.com/codesearch?hl=en&lr=&q=[^-*a-zA-Z]deftrace([^-*a-zA-Z]|%24)+package%3Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fclojure-contrib\.googlecode\.com&sbtn=Search Search for references in contrib]----
===(_trace_ value)===
===(_trace_ name value)===
<pre> Sends name (optional) and value to the tracer function, then
returns value.  May be wrapped around any expression without
affecting the result.</pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/trace.clj#46 Source] [http://www.google.com/codesearch?hl=en&lr=&q=[^-*a-zA-Z]trace([^-*a-zA-Z]|%24)+package%3Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fclojure-contrib\.googlecode\.com&sbtn=Search Search for references in contrib]----
===(_trace-fn-call_ name f args)===
<pre> Traces a single call to a function f with args.  'name' is the
symbol name of the function.</pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/trace.clj#60 Source] [http://www.google.com/codesearch?hl=en&lr=&q=[^-*a-zA-Z]trace-fn-call([^-*a-zA-Z]|%24)+package%3Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fclojure-contrib\.googlecode\.com&sbtn=Search Search for references in contrib]----
===(_trace-indent_)===
<pre> Returns an indentation string based on `*`trace-depth`*`</pre>

[http://code.google.com/p/clojure-contrib/source/browse/trunk/src/clojure/contrib/trace.clj#55 Source] [http://www.google.com/codesearch?hl=en&lr=&q=[^-*a-zA-Z]trace-indent([^-*a-zA-Z]|%24)+package%3Ahttp%3A%2F%2Fclojure-contrib\.googlecode\.com&sbtn=Search Search for references in contrib]----
===(_tracer_ name value)===
<pre> This function is called by trace.  Prints to standard output, but
may be rebound to do anything you like.  'name' is optional.</pre>
